item.title: Beach Boys - Surfin' U.S.A
item.description:
If ev’rybody
had an ocean
across the U.S.A.
Then ev’rybody
be surfin’
like California
You’d see them
wearin’ their baggies
huarachisandals too
A bushy bushy
blonde hair do
Surfin’ U.S.A.
You’ll catch’em
surfin’ at DelMar
Ventura Country Line
Santacruz and Tressels
Australia’s Narabine
All over Manhattan
and down Doheny way
Everybody’s
gone surfin’
Surfin’ U.S.A.
We’ll all be
plannin’ cut a route
we’re gonna
take real soon
We’re waxin’ down
our surfboards
we can’t wait for June
We’ll all be gone
for the summer
we’re on safari to stay
Tell the teacher
we’re surfin’
Surfin’ U.S.A.
At Haggarty’s
and Swami’s
Pacific Palisades

Redondo Beach L.A
All over LaJolla
at Waiameabay
Everybody’s
gone surfin’
